sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Debug message queue
sect1.para: This page shows information about the Debug Message Queue.

simplelist.member: Click to refresh the debug message queue list.

To view the process info page click the process name link on the Process name's row in the listing. This will go to a page showing the state of the process, actions for the process and list of instances for the process.

To view the current status of an instance click the link on the Instance ID's row in the listing. This will go to a separate page showing the state of each activity of the instance, including variable values, partner links etc.

Click on the current row in the listing to proceed. This will go to a separate page depending on the type of the message: to the Outgoing message page, to the Incoming message page or to the Response message page.
Click to navigate among the list of messages.
